title: sources of local food
name: sources of local food
description:
A Map by Seacoasteatlocal

resources of where to find and buy local foods in the Seacoast area

properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal12 Rover Ave, Hampton, NHcall 603.929.0970, generally open 10am - 8pm 7 days a week. Lobster directly from the lobsterman
Posted by Seacoasteatlocal70 Sligo Road Rollinsford NHBrookford Farm organic raw milk call ahead: 603-742-4084

properties.name: Applecrest Farm
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal133 Exeter Rd Hampton Falls NHpeaches in the summer, apples and awesome apple cider in the fall, as well as pumpkins and other produce - some produce brought in - ask to find out what is native or local

properties.name: Barker's Farm Stand
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal 218 Portsmouth Ave, Stratham, NHCorn! amoung many other things . . . mostly produce, honey as well.

properties.name: Dover Farmers Market - Wednesdays
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal   henry law ave dover nhWednesdays 2:15 - 5:30 at Henry Law Park. Website lists vendors.

properties.name: Durham Farmers' Market - Mondays
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal   8 Pettee Brook Ln Durham NHMondays 2:15 - 5:30, website lists vendors

properties.name: Exeter Farmers Market - Thursdays
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal   swazey parkway exeter nhWednesdays 2:15 - 5:30 on Swazey Parkway. Website lists vendors.

properties.name: Hampton Farmers Market - Tuesdays
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal   289 Lafayette Rd hampton nhIn the parking lot of Sacred Heart School, Tuesdays 3:00 - 6:00. Website lists vendors.

properties.name: Kellie Brook Farm
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal 1024 Portsmouth Ave, Greenland, NH 03840meat and vegetables - self-serve stand and refrigerator (ie, meat always available). Chicken, pork, turkey, eggs

properties.name: Kingston Farmers Market - Tuesdays
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal   148 Main St kingston nhOn the Kingston \'plains\' Tuesdays 2:15 - 5:30. Website lists vendors.

properties.name: Lasting Legacy Farm
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal 151 Second Crown Point RD., Barrington, NHlocal and sustainable meat - beef, pork, chicken, turkey, and lamb

properties.name: Little Bay Buffalo Company
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal 50 Langely Road, Durham, NHbuffalo meat and sausages

properties.name: Monahan Farm
properties.description: Posted by Rovingsprout2 South Rd. E. Kingston, nhinfo line is 603.642.8186

properties.name: Portsmouth Farmers' Market - Saturdays
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal   1 Junkins Avenue, Portsmouth, NH 03801A huge market filled with lots of great produce and other foods! Website lists vendors. Saturdays 8am-1pm

properties.name: Squamscot Beverages
properties.description: Posted by Seacoasteatlocal120 Exeter Road Newfields NHSquamscot sodas are locally made (if not 100% local, i.e. flavorings). Website lists retail locations if you can\'t get to the bottling center. Cases of 24 bottles are 4.
